topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Viewing Standard Region System Status (Overview)

body.p: When you first log into the Helion interface, the Overview page appears.
The information in the page depends upon which region you are using, non-KVM or KVM.

section.p: To view information on the servers in the Standard Region, click the deployment name in the region selector.

body.p:
The Usage Summary displays information over the specified period of time for the current project.:
VCPUs. The number of virtual CPUs allocated to the project.
Disk GB. The virtual root disk size in gigabytes.
RAM GB Memory allocated to the project.
VCPU Hours. The VCPU hours for the project.
Disk GB Hours. The total GB-hours for the project.
